dataview-recent-files.name: Dataview Recent Files
dataview-recent-files.anno:
markdown:
My own plugin to show the recently modified files.
[[2024-06-13 Survey group culture]]

[[2024-08-05 Review Cs-based Rydberg quantum computers]]

dataview.name: Dataview
dataview.anno: Super-useful plugin that allows querying the notes to provide database functionality. üî•üî•üî•

obsidian-completr.name: Completr
obsidian-completr.anno: Allows auto-completion of commands. Very useful.

find-unlinked-files.name: Find orphaned files and broken links
find-unlinked-files.anno: Very useful to find orphaned files and broken links.

homepage.name: Homepage
homepage.anno: Useful to show a customized homepage.

import-attachments-plus.name: Import Attachments+
import-attachments-plus.anno: My own plugin to import attachments by moving them into the vault.

languagetool.name: LanguageTool Checker
languagetool.anno: It is claimed to be better but it does not work. It is still in beta function.

number-headings-obsidian.name: Number Headings
number-headings-obsidian.anno: Very useful to add numbers to the headings.

pdf-plus.name: PDF++
pdf-plus.anno: Very useful to comment PDF documents in Obsidian.

obsidian-tasks-plugin.name: Tasks
obsidian-tasks-plugin.anno: Not really useful. Never used so far.

obsidian-style-settings.name: Style Settings
obsidian-style-settings.anno: Super useful to customize the style with CCS and be able to modify the settings from Obsidian.

obsidian-smart-typography.name: Smart Typography
obsidian-smart-typography.anno: Semi useful to improve typography of symbols.

wikilinks-to-mdlinks-obsidian.name: Wikilinks to MDLinks
wikilinks-to-mdlinks-obsidian.anno: Not really needed. It converts Wikilinks to MD links.

webpage-html-export.name: Webpage HTML Export
webpage-html-export.anno: Super useful to export in HTML. It is a bit clunky to load. It is per default disabled, unless I need it.

frontmatter-modified-date.name: Update modified date
frontmatter-modified-date.anno: Very useful to update the property `modified date`.

supercharged-links-obsidian.name: Supercharged Links
supercharged-links-obsidian.anno: The idea is very nice but then the MD notes are not really readable outside of Obsidian. Disabled for now.

tag-wrangler.name: Tag Wrangler
tag-wrangler.anno: Very useful to rename tags across all notes.

sheets.name: Sheets Extended
sheets.anno: Useful to extend tables and merge cells.

obsidian-html-plugin.name: HTML Reader
obsidian-html-plugin.anno: It allows opening HTML files in Obsidian.

callout-manager.name: Callout Manager
callout-manager.anno: Offers a GUI to customize callouts.

obsidian-file-path-to-uri.name: File path to URI
obsidian-file-path-to-uri.anno: Not really needed. It converts a file path to a URI.

obsidian-text-expander-js.name: Inline Scripts
obsidian-text-expander-js.anno: Quite powerful to run inline scripts, and replace predefined macros. However, not really used.

omnisearch.name: Omnisearch
omnisearch.anno: Powerful tool to search through the vault.

obsidian-outliner.name: Outliner
obsidian-outliner.anno: Very handy to operate on outlines.

url-into-selection.name: Paste URL into selection
url-into-selection.anno: Not really needed. It causes more confusion when pasting on existing selected text.

periodic-notes.name: Periodic Notes
periodic-notes.anno: Manages daily notes. Just used for daily notes.

settings-search.name: Settings Search
settings-search.anno: Adds a search field with a fuzzy search functionality to search through Obsidian settings.

text-extractor.name: Text Extractor
text-extractor.anno: I did not really test it how good it works.

file-explorer-note-count.name: File Explorer Note Count
file-explorer-note-count.anno: Very useful to display the number of notes in the various folders.

plugins-annotations.name: Plugins Annotations
plugins-annotations.anno: My own plugin to take notes about installed plugins.

editing-toolbar.name: Editing Toolbar
editing-toolbar.anno: Nice toolbar shown above the notes. Quite handy.

obsidian-spaced-repetition.name: Spaced Repetition
obsidian-spaced-repetition.anno: Super effective plugin to learn flashcards.

table-editor-obsidian.name: Advanced Tables
table-editor-obsidian.anno: A must to operate on tables in Obsidian. üöÄüöÄüöÄ

obsidian-admonition.name: Admonition
obsidian-admonition.anno: Improve callouts üñãÔ∏è. They can be¬†entered as `codeblocks`.

obsidian-divide-and-conquer.name: Divide & Conquer
obsidian-divide-and-conquer.anno: Plugin useful to debug problems with plugins. Generally, it can be left disabled.

js-engine.name: JS Engine
js-engine.anno: Allows executing Javascript dynamically in the note.

plugin-reloader.name: Plugin Reloader
plugin-reloader.anno: Allows reloading a specific plugin without restarting Obsidian. Hotkeys configurable.
